==Trivia==
* The name of this soundtrack is a reference to the poem ''{{w|Clair de lune (poem)|Clair de lune}}'' written by the French poet {{w|Paul Verlaine}}.
** It may also be a reference to the third movement of ''{{w|Suite bergamasque}}'' with the same name, one of the most famous musical pieces written by the French composer {{w|Claude Debussy}}, which were also inspired from the poem.
* {{Transclude|Limpide est le sanglot d'eau|FountainOfLucineTheme1|section=1}}
